name: Sword and Pistol
descriptionText: You effortlessly pair melee and ranged weaponry.
benefitText: When you use the Two-Weapon Fighting feat while wielding a melee weapon and a crossbow or firearm, your attacks with the crossbow or firearm provoke no attacks of opportunity from foes that you threaten with your melee weapon.
normalText: Making a ranged attack provokes attacks of opportunity.
